description: Manoj Bajpayee and Jim Sarbh starrer Inspector Zende is a new Netflix series, set to uncover the real-life story of finding the serial killer Charles Sobhraj, who murdered a lot of tourists in the 1970s across Asia, and how Madhukar Zende, a Mumbai cop, tracked him down and caught him in 1986 and put him behind bars, is a thrilling crime series, releasing on the September 5th.
title: Inspector Zende OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Manoj Bajpayee Starrer Thriller Online?

description: SpaceX has signed a landmark agreement with the Italian Space Agency (ASI) to deliver Italian science experiments to Mars aboard its Starship rocket. Announced on August 7, 2025, the mission will carry a plant-growth module, a meteorological station, and a radiation detector to collect crucial data during the six-month journey and on the Martian surface. These experiments will study plant growth in space, monitor Mars’ weather, and measure cosmic radiation—information vital for future human exploration. The launch is targeted for the November–December 2026 Mars window, pending Starship’s readiness. This partnership signals a new era of commercial interplanetary missions, enabling nations to buy payload flights without building their own spacecraft.
title: SpaceX to Fly Italian Science Experiments to Mars on Starship in 2026

description: On July 30, 2025, the NASA–CNES SWOT satellite captured the leading edge of a tsunami wave in the Pacific, triggered by an 8.8 magnitude earthquake near Russia’s Kamchatka Peninsula. Recorded about 70 minutes after the quake, the wave measured 1.5 feet in open water but could grow to 30 feet at shore. SWOT’s advanced radar mapped the wave’s height, profile, and direction—providing data never before captured in such detail. NOAA’s Center for Tsunami Research found that integrating SWOT data could greatly improve forecast accuracy, a major step forward in disaster preparedness. Experts see this as a breakthrough in early tsunami detection.
title: SWOT Satellite Captures Tsunami Wave After Kamchatka Quake

description: Microsoft Lens app will be discontinued later this year, the company said last week. The app was designed to scan images of physical documents, text, handwritten papers, and whiteboards and convert them into digital files. However, the Redmond-based tech giant stated that it will be retired in a phased manner by the end of this year.
title: Microsoft Lens App to Be Retired at the End of This Year, Company Suggests Users Switch to Copilot

description: According to IDC, India’s smartphone market shipped 70 million units in H1 2025, growing 0.9 percent YoY. In Q2 alone, shipments rose 7.3 percent YoY to 37 million. The growth was driven by new model launches across all segments, price cuts on older phones, better offline margins, and strong marketing.
title: Smartphone Shipments in India Grew 7.3 Percent YoY in Q2 2025; Vivo Retains Top Spot

description: A California man named Lawrence Klein has filed a lawsuit against Microsoft over ending Windows 10 support. The decision to discontinue support for Windows 10 is alleged to be part of the company’s larger strategy to force its customers to purchase new devices optimised to run Microsoft’s suite of generative AI software.
title: Microsoft Faces Lawsuit Over Decision to End Windows 10 Support

description: Oppo Find X9 Ultra is expected to succeed the Find X8 Ultra, which was launched on April 10. The recent leaks suggest that the phone could feature a quad rear camera setup with 200-megapixel and 50-megapixel periscope sensors with adjustable focal lengths. Expected to launch by the end of the year as part of the Find X9 series, the phone could be powered by the yet-to-launch Snapdragon 8 Elite 2 chipset.
title: Oppo Find X9 Ultra to Feature Bigger Dual-Cell Battery Than Find X8 Ultra, Tipster Claims

description: Samsung Galaxy M17 5G (SM-M176B) has been spotted on the Google Play Console, alongside the Galaxy F17 5G (SM-E176B), both sharing the “a17x” device code. Reports suggest they will be rebranded versions of the Galaxy A17 5G, similar to previous M, F, and A series cross-rebrands. The Galaxy M17 5G is expected to feature an Exynos 1330 chipset, 4GB RAM, Android 15-based One UI 7, a 1,080×2,340-pixel Infinity-U display, and a vertical pill-shaped rear camera module.
title: Samsung Galaxy M17 5G Reportedly Listed on Google Play Console Ahead of Debut

description: ChatGPT’s health advice was the reason behind a man’s trip to the hospital, as per a new case study. The study highlights that a 60-year-old person was suffering from rare metal poisoning, which resulted in a range of symptoms, including psychosis. The study also mentions that the poisoning, identified as being caused by long-term sodium bromide consumption, occurred because the patient took advice from ChatGPT about dietary changes.
title: ChatGPT’s Health Advice Sends 60-Year-Old Man to the Hospital, Raises Questions on Its Reliability

description: iPhone 17 series is "likely" to be more expensive than its predecessors, according to analyst Jeff Pu of GF Securities. The potential price hike is attributed to US tariffs on imported goods from China, which impact where Apple assembles its products. The analyst suggests that changing trade policies could still lead to higher prices for the new iPhone models.
title: iPhone 17 Series to Debut at Higher Prices Than iPhone 16 Lineup, Analyst Says

description: The Oppo K13 Turbo and Oppo K13 Turbo Pro have been launched in India. Both handsets come with an interesting set of features and specifications. The Oppo K13 Turbo is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 8450 processor, while the Oppo K13 Turbo Pro packs the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 processor. Check out the first impressions of both devices to know more about them.
title: Oppo K13 Turbo and K13 Turbo Pro First Impressions

description: Xiaomi’s budget tablet is finally back after a three-year wait. On the surface, it appears to have gotten a few upgrades. There’s a bigger display, a bigger battery and a new processor. There’s also stylus support and, finally, cellular connectivity. It’s an attractive package that is well-priced, but is it better than the ageing Redmi Pad from 2022?
title: Redmi Pad 2 Review: The Budget Tablet Done Right

description: Samsung Galaxy Tab A11 has been spotted on Korea's certification body. The upcoming tablet is expected as an upgrade to the Samsung Galaxy Tab A9, although Samsung hasn't provided details about the new model so far. The tablet was seen on the South Korean certification body with a model number SM-X135N. The listing includes an alleged image of the device.
title: Samsung Galaxy Tab A11 Live Image Surfaces on Safety Korea Database in Sign of Imminent Launch

description: Apple is reportedly working on its first laptop that will sport an OLED display. Samsung is going to supply the OLED displays for the rumoured MacBook Pro model, as per a recent report. The laptop is said to be powered by Apple’s M6 chip. A recent report had suggested that the MacBook Pro with an M6 chip and an OLED display will be unveiled in late 2026. However, a seasoned journalist has revealed that the laptop could debut between early 2026 and late 2027.
title: Apple's MacBook Pro With M6 Chip, OLED Display Could Launch by Early 2027: Mark Gurman

description: Flipkart Independence Day Sale 2025 will start this week, the company has announced. During the five-day-long sale event, the e-commerce platform will offer instant discounts, cashback offers, and exchange bonuses on several electronics and home appliances, like smartphones, laptops, televisions, and other gadgets.
title: Flipkart Independence Day Sale 2025 Date: Know More about Product Discounts and Bank Offers

description: Gemini Live is finally being integrated with several first-party Google apps. The real-time two-way voice mode feature within the Gemini app can now connect to apps like Google Calendar, Maps, and Tasks to perform specific tasks. This capability was first announced by the Mountain View-based tech giant at Google I/O in May.
title: Gemini Live Integration With Google Calendar, Maps and Tasks App Finally Rolling Out

description: Honor X7c will launch in India soon.  It is confirmed to feature an AI-backed 50-megapixel rear camera unit. The handset is already available in select international markets. It runs on a Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 chipset and a 6.8-inch display.  We already know what to expect from this handset, as it was launched in other markets a year ago.
title: Honor X7c 5G India Launch Teased; Confirmed to Debut With 50-Megapixel Camera

description: A tipster has shared alleged images of iPhone 17 series screen protectors, hinting at size differences across models, with the base iPhone 17 smallest, the Pro slightly larger, the Air between Pro and Pro Max, and the Pro Max largest. The iPhone 17 Air may feature a 6.6-inch 120Hz OLED display, A19 chip, 2,800mAh battery, 48-megapixel rear and 24-megapixel front cameras. Expected to be 5.5mm thick and weigh 145g, it may come in Black, Light Blue, Light Gold, and White shades.
title: iPhone 17 Series Screen Protector Leak Hints at Display Sizes; iPhone 17 Air Could Surpass Pro Model in Size

description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman announced on Sunday that the company is increasing the rate limit of the reasoning models for all users. The San Francisco-based AI firm said this new change will affect all model classes; however, this change is temporary. Going forward, the company stated that it will determine how to address this capacity trade-off, suggesting that those on the free tier may lose access to certain features.
title: OpenAI Increases GPT-5 Thinking Usage Limit After Backlash from Users, But There's a Catch

description: Tesla on Monday inaugurated its first Experience Centre in Delhi. It has also set up Superchargers at the facility that will enable Tesla buyers to charge their electric vehicles (EVs) on site. Located in Aerocity, the new Tesla Experience Centre in Delhi is the Elon Musk-owned automotive company’s second showroom in India and builds upon the first showroom located in Mumbai's Bandra Kurla Complex (BKC), which was inaugurated last month.
title: Tesla Opens First Experience Centre in New Delhi’s Aerocity; Four V4 Superchargers Established On-Site

description: iQOO 15 could launch soon as a successor to last year's iQOO 13 model. An iQOO executive during a gaming livestream in China officially confirmed the name and existence of the phone. It could pack a Snapdragon 8 Elite 2 chipset and a 2K resolution display. The iQOO 15 could feature a 7,000mAh battery.
title: iQOO 15 Arrival Teased Again as iQOO Readies Launch of Next Flagship Smartphone

description: Lava Blaze AMOLED 2 5G has been launched in India with MediaTek Dimensity 7060 chipset and a 5,000mAh battery. It has a 6.67-inch AMOLED display and a 50-megapixel rear camera unit. It will go on sale in India starting August 16.
title: Lava Blaze AMOLED 2 5G With MediaTek Dimensity 7060 SoC Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Microsoft has silently released a new artificial intelligence (AI) feature for Copilot that will allow users to convert a static 2D image into a 3D model. Dubbed Copilot 3D, it is a new experimental feature available via Copilot Labs. The Redmond-based tech giant said that the feature will be available to all users globally, provided they are signed into their personal Microsoft accounts.
title: Microsoft Quietly Launches Copilot 3D as Experimental Feature, Turns 2D Images into 3D Models

description: The Oppo Enco Buds 3 Pro, priced at Rs. 1,799, will be available from August 27 via Flipkart and Oppo India’s website in black and white shades. Featuring 12.4mm titanium-plated dynamic drivers, enhanced bass tuning, and a customisable EQ via the Hey Melody app, they support Bluetooth 5.4, dual-device pairing, and an IP55 rating for dust and water resistance. The battery life is claimed to be up to 54 hours with the case, with a 10-minute quick charge giving 4 hours on just the earphones.
title: Oppo Enco Buds 3 Pro Launched in India With Up to 54 Hours of Total Battery Life: Price, Specifications

description: Vivo Vision is in the development stage, a company executive announced on Monday via social media. The mixed reality headset was first unveiled at the Boao Forum for Asia Annual Conference 2025 in March, sporting a design very similar to the Apple Vision Pro. The company is reportedly gearing up for its launch. According to the official, Vivo has also set up a mixed reality experience zone for select personnel to test the headset.
title: Vivo Vision Mixed Reality Headset Launch Confirmed by Official; to Arrive as Apple Vision Pro Competitor

description: HTC Wildfire E4 Plus has been launched in Thailand. The phone is available in two colour options and a single RAM and internal storage variant. The phone is powered by a Unisoc T606 SoC, coupled with 4GB of RAM and 128GB of onboard storage. It sports a display with HD+ resolution and a 90Hz refresh rate.
title: HTC Wildfire E4 Plus With 50-Megapixel Camera, 4,850mAh Battery Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Microsoft has confirmed it will continue to support Forza Motorsport and Forza Horizon 5. The Xbox parent, however, did not confirm future entries in the two racing franchises. Turn 10 Studios said it was adding new content to Forza Motorsport, a month after the studio was reportedly hit with layoffs.
title: Microsoft Says Forza Motorsport Will Continue to Get Support Despite Cuts at Developer Turn 10 Studios

description: The Oppo K13 Turbo series features a 6.80-inch 1.5K AMOLED display with up to 1,600 nits brightness. The base model uses a MediaTek Dimensity 8450 chip, while the Pro has a Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC. They have 50-megapixel dual rear camera units, 16-megapixel front cameras, 7,000mAh batteries with 80W charging and bypass charging support. Each handset has an inbuilt fan, air ducts, and a 7,000 sq mm VC cooling unit each.
title: Oppo K13 Turbo Pro, Oppo K13 Turbo Launched in India With Built-In Cooling Fan, 7,000mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: Ten years ago, access to a personal computer was a luxury. Today, it's fast becoming a basic need. Not just for college students, but for children in school too.
title: My Child Doesn’t Need a PC, Until They Really Do

description: Realme seems to be preparing for the launch of its Realme GT 8 series. Several posts hinting at the upcoming GT series devices have surfaced on Chinese social media. A fresh leak has disclosed key details, including the display and battery details of the Realme GT 8. Both models may come equipped with the upcoming Snapdragon 8 Elite 2 chipset.
title: Realme GT 8 Officially Teased Ahead of Anticipated Launch in October; Tipster Leaks Display, Battery Specifications

description: Realme P4 Series’ India launch date has been revealed by a company executive. Moreover, the specifications and the price of the upcoming series have been teased. The executive also hinted that there might only be two smartphones in the lineup - the Realme P4 and the Realme P4 Pro. This is part of the company’s efforts to make its product lines leaner in India.
title: Realme P4 Series Launch Date Revealed; Price Range and Specifications Teased

description: Sony’s WF-C710N true wireless earphones, launched in India in July, feature active noise cancellation (ANC) and touch controls. Succeeding 2023’s WF-C700N, they bring a few upgrades while retaining core features and a no-nonsense design. Priced at Rs. 8,990, we explore whether the WF-C710N are the best ANC option, highlighting their strengths and weaknesses in this review.
title: Sony WF-C710N Review: Best Noise Cancellation Deal from Sony

description: Honor is working on a new smartphone that will come with a 10,000mAh battery, as per a tipster. The handset is rumoured to be powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 8500 chipset, potentially becoming one of the first options in the market to get this new SoC. The tipster also suggests it has entered the New Product Introduction (NPI) stage. Although its moniker remains unknown, reports suggest that the purported model could debut as the Honor Power 2.
title: Upcoming Honor Smartphone With Dimensity 8500 SoC Tipped to Get 10,000mAh Battery

description: xAI expanded the company's latest artificial intelligence (AI) model, Grok 4, to all users on Sunday. The model, released last month, was previously only available to paid subscribers. With this expansion, those on the free tier will be able to use Grok 4’s Auto and Expert mode, while Heavy continues to be exclusive to the SuperGrok Heavy users.
title: xAI Expands Grok 4 AI Model to All Users Globally, Offers Increased Rate Limits for a Limited Time

description: Apple will finally begin onboarding Siri with more advanced capabilities next year, according to claims by a seasoned journalist. The Cupertino-based tech giant’s AI-based voice assistant was due to receive major upgrades in 2024 with iOS 18, but most of those plans were shelved as it fell behind competitors in the AI race. Apple is now expected to release Siri’s advanced features, including a new app intents system, to Apple devices early next year.
title: Apple Reportedly Plans to Release Revamped Siri With App Intents Feature Next Spring

description: The Tecno Spark Go 5G will launch in India on August 14 at 12pm IST, via Amazon. It will feature a 6,000mAh battery and measure 7.99mm in thickness, while weighing 194g. It will support no-network communication via Tecno’s Free Link App, along with AI tools like Ella AI, with support for multiple Indian languages, AI Writing Assistant, and Google’s Circle to Search.
title: Tecno Spark Go 5G India Launch Date Announced; Amazon Availability, Key Features Confirmed

description: Samsung will begin the rollout of the One UI 8 Beta update for the Galaxy S24 series, Galaxy Z Fold 6, and the Galaxy Z Flip 6 beginning today (August 11). The Android 16-based beta programme for the aforementioned models was announced last week for India, the US, and select other markets. With its arrival, the Galaxy S24 series and the sixth generation Galaxy foldables will become the first handsets apart from the Galaxy S25 lineup to receive the beta update.
title: One UI 8 Beta Programme for Galaxy S24 Series, Galaxy Z Fold 6 and Flip 6 Begins Today: Compatible Models, How to Download

description: Oppo K13 Turbo series is all set to be launched in India today (August 11). The lineup will comprise two models — Oppo K13 Turbo and Oppo K13 Turbo Pro. In the days leading up to the launch, the company has been highlighting several of the features that its upcoming handsets will offer. Here is all you need to know about the Oppo K13 Turbo series ahead of its launch in India today at 12pm IST.
title: Oppo K13 Turbo Series Launching Today: Know Price in India, Features and Specifications

description: The Oppo K13x 5G promises several durability features, an adaptive 120Hz screen, good performance, AI features, and a long battery life — all under Rs. 12,000. But do these on-paper upgrades translate into an equivalent real-world experience? Find out in our Oppo K13x 5G review.
title: Oppo K13x 5G Review: Built to Last But With One Big Compromise
